page.title: 17Residents Views N. Bedford
page.content: Residents of the Cleat hill area were asked for their views of the area.Most found it was nice and quiet though the traffic has become busier.It is definitely a place for the more elderly or those who do not mind the slower pace of life.It is a friendly place with few robberies or vandalism and little litter.Shops are about a mile away and it does not seem to make much difference whether you have your own transport or not since buses run quite frequently.Surprisingly the younger generation who have moved into the area do not like the new modern attractions-they preferred it as it was.Apparently it is quite a wealthy area as most children have horses or ponies.Residents have lived here for an average of 12 years.
